001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.util.Base64;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
011import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.InternalLogger;
012import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.Utils;
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
014
015/**
016 * Token supplier using password flow
017 */
018public class GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier extends AutoCloseableService implements TokenSupplier {
019    private final InternalLogger logger = InternalLogger.getLogger(LOGGER_AUTH);
020
021    private final VrapHttpClient vrapHttpClient;
022    private final ApiHttpRequest apiHttpRequest;
023
024    public GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final String clientId, final String clientSecret, final String email,
025            final String password, final String scope, final String tokenEndpoint,
026            final VrapHttpClient vrapHttpClient) {
027        this.vrapHttpClient = vrapHttpClient;
028        this.apiHttpRequest = constructApiHttpRequest(clientId, clientSecret, email, password, scope, tokenEndpoint);
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public CompletableFuture<AuthenticationToken> getToken() {
033        return vrapHttpClient.execute(apiHttpRequest).whenComplete((response, throwable) -> {
034            if (throwable != null) {
035                logger.error(() -> response, throwable);
036            }
037            else {
038                logger.debug(() -> response);
039            }
040        }).thenApply(apiHttpResponse -> {
041            if (apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode() < 200 || apiHttpResponse.getStatusCode() > 299) {
042                throw new CompletionException(new Throwable(new String(apiHttpResponse.getBody())));
043            }
044            return apiHttpResponse;
045        })
046                .thenApply(Utils.wrapToCompletionException((ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) -> JsonUtils
047                        .fromJsonByteArray(response.getBody(), AuthenticationToken.class)));
048    }
049
050    private static ApiHttpRequest constructApiHttpRequest(final String clientId, final String clientSecret,
051            final String email, final String password, final String scope, final String tokenEndpoint) {
052        String auth = Base64.getEncoder()
053                .encodeToString((clientId + ":" + clientSecret).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
054
055        final String body;
056        if (scope == null || scope.isEmpty()) {
057            body = "grant_type=password&username=" + email + "&password=" + password;
058        }
059        else {
060            body = "grant_type=password&username=" + email + "&password=" + password + "&scope=" + scope;
061        }
062        ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders().withHeader("Authorization", "Basic " + auth)
063                .withHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
064        return new ApiHttpRequest(ApiHttpMethod.POST, URI.create(tokenEndpoint), apiHttpHeaders,
065            body.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    protected void internalClose() {
070        if (vrapHttpClient instanceof AutoCloseable)
071            closeQuietly((AutoCloseable) vrapHttpClient);
072    }
073}
